```{r}
library(datasets)
Data1<- read.csv("players_stats_by_season_full_details.csv")
```

```{r}
str(Data1)
```

```{r}
Data_use <- subset(Data1, select = c(GP,STL,height))
Data_use
```
```{r}
fit <- lm(GP~STL+height, data = Data1)
summary(fit)
```


```{r}
library(predict3d)
```

```{r}
ggPredict(fit)
```
